title: I Am So Cool Lyrics Kaaki Sattai Song Lyrics
stanzas: I Am So Cool Song Lyrics From Kaaki Satti (2014)

Singer: Siva karthikeyan
Music: Anirudh
Lyrics: Arun Raj, Kamaraj

Anbe anbe, kadhal varudhey
Siren kooda song-ah varudhey.
Un pinne heart-um varudhey
Adhu kooda beatum varudhu.
Tubelighta pola pechum
Thikki varudhey.

One way-la beauty varudhey
Run way-la scooty varudhey
No entry potu
Oru heartu
strictaa varudhey.

Yeah, wow
What a music ..!!
Aaaaahhhhhh
I am so cool..

Baby honey sweet pie
Never wanna see u cry
If that happens I will die
Baby honey sweet pie(2)

Kokki potuthaan
sikka vachchitaa
sokki thavikkuren baby
6th sense-la sticker otti nee
katti podura lady

sokka paakkura
naekka pesura
daekka kodukkura baby

taakka pottu thaan
kaakkaa pidikkura
confirm pannu en baby

Yeah, wow
What a music ..!!
Aaaaahhhhhh
I am so cool.

Let us discuss
The problem
Faced by youth of the nation.
Nation ...

Looku viduveeenga
Lighta sirippeenga
Aasa kaattiye
Pesi kolluveenga.

Close-u aanadhum
Love a sollitaa.
Best friend-nu
 bulty adippeenga.

ayyo ayyayyoo
Kadhal poiyoo.
Therinje adha
Thiruppithaan pannura
Boysu haiyyoo.

Looku viduveeenga
Lighta sirippeenga
Funnu koduppeenga.

Kokki potuthaan
sikka vachchitaa
Taakkaa pottuthaan

Kokki potuthaan
sikka vachchitaa
sokki thavikkuren baby
6th sense-la sticker otti nee
katti podura lady

sokka paakkura
naekka pesura
daekka kodukkura baby

taakka pottu thaan
kaakkaa pidikkura
confirm pannu en baby

Baby honey sweet pie
